title: deleting emails
content: Thunderbird hasn't been working properly lately. Every time I delete an email it will delete the one below it also.

title: Can not add an email account on mac mini os14.6.1 via Octimum.net as Suddenlink.net
content: I would like to connect to Suddenlink.net via Optimum.net. It does show up on Optimum.net account on web page. I have a screen shot of the constant results of my days of efforts. I have two other connections via gmail.com and it works fine. I have people who are still using Suddenlink emails to me and I would like to see them on Thunderbird. Thanks for the fine software and any help with this. //... Joe
creator: wa8sie1

title: Thunderbird outbox
content:
I seemed to have lost my OUTBOX folder in my Thunerbird email.

creator: peter.bate.aust

title: Unable to send emails in Tbird from MS aliases
content:
Hi,

I have an Outlook email account with multiple aliases. If I send an email from the default outlook account, all is well. However, if I try and send an email from one of the aliases I get the following error.

"Sending of the message failed. Unable to authenticate to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.office365.com. Please check the password and verify the 'Authentication method' in 'Account Settings | Outgoing server (SMTP)'."

Setting on the alias accocunts are the same as the default.

Sending an email from the alias accounts in Win 10 mail works.

Please advise.

Regards,

Steve
creator: OzSteveC
